Name: FADS1/2/3 enhancer

Name: MYB enhancer
Description: intragenic enhancer within AHI1; labeled as MYB-enh-3 in Xie et al., 2019; labeled as E1 in Dieter Weichenhan et al., 2023
Reference: Xie et al., 2019; Dieter Weichenhan et al., 2023

Name: SYN1 promoter
Description: SYN1 gene transcription is suppressed via REST binding to SYN1 promoter in non-neural tissues
